company_commercial_names: first discoveries | first discoveries montessori academy
locations: us, united states, texas, granbury, 76049, east us highway 377, 5200, 32.4597421, -97.7219335
short_description: first discoveries is a montessori school based in granbury, texas, united states.
long_description: first discoveries montessori academy was created to combine the traditional montessori classroom with full time child care. the montessori philosophy has been around for many years and incorporated in many private preschools and elementary schools worldwide. our goal is to encourage the development of responsible, caring young people who can direct their own lives, in a conscientious and thoughtful manner, and contribute to making the world a better place for future generations. the montessori method combines mixed-age classes with a carefully prepared environment of learning materials and flexible daily experiences. first discoveries follows the philosophy of dr. we emphasize individualized child centered education as opposed to strict curricular education. in essence, we offer the world on a silver platter knowing that the innate curiosity of children will promote independence, exploration, experimentation, and creativity. we believe that the most important years of a child's education are not high school and college, but the early preschool and elementary school age.
business_tags: the montessori philosophy | montessori education | child care | the montessori method | education & students | toddler & preschool | elementary school | private preschool | prepared environment | habits of mind | academic standards | emotional growth | high school and college | elementary school age | early preschool
generated_description: first discoveries montessori academy, legally known as first discoveries montessori academy inc., is an educational institution located in granbury, texas. established in 2008, the academy combines traditional montessori classroom methods with full-time child care services. the school offers programs for toddlers, preschoolers, and kindergarteners, focusing on individualized, child-centered education. the montessori philosophy emphasizes mixed-age classes, a prepared environment, and flexible daily experiences, with a strong emphasis on respect for self, others, and the physical environment. the academy aims to foster the development of responsible, caring young people who can direct their own lives and contribute to making the world a better place.
